name: Derrick BARNES, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary John E. Wetzel, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Barnes v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Derrick BARNES, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary John E. Wetzel, Appellees.

opinions.text:
Proposed Action: Per Curiam Affirm
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of December, 2013, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
82 A.3d 406
Derrick BARNES, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary John E. Wetzel, Appellees.
